Desc.entry: A service run by Sheffield City Council to help businesses find out about and access the support and advice they can get from the council and other organisations. The service is aimed at those trying to get a new idea off the ground as well as existing businesses needing information and advice. First Point for Business can provide practical support such as start-up advice, business planning, marketing or workforce training and skills development.

DisabledAccess.entry: Changing Places Toilet available in this building
